title: Add product module
content:
This page explains how to add a product module record.

Prerequisite

Before adding a module for a product model, ensure that the product model is in the Active phase. For the procedure to change the phase of a product model, see the "Change phase of product model" section in  Product model workflow.

Add product module

You can add modules only for product models of type Product.

To add a product module:

  1. Click  > Plan > Company.
  2. In the Companies dropdown, click Product Modules. This directs you to the Product Modules tab, which displays the list of product modules added in the agent interface.
  3. Click New.
  4. Enter the display label for the module in the Display label box.
  5. Select the product model for the module from the Product Model list.
  6. Enter a description for the module in the Description box.
  7. Click SAVE. This redirects you to the Product Modules tab. You can see the product module you created.
